As a sales executive with 30 years experience, I help my clients improve their operations and financials through the optimized implementation of business technology, while focusing on People and Processes. I work with my clients on ERP, Supply Chain, Human Resource Management, Procurement, Customer Experience & Commerce and other LOB specific solutions. I work tirelessly for my clients, and have been recognized with numerous awards during my career.

Clients and colleagues know me as a highly creative business partner who can always be trusted to provide honest and effective solutions. I have always known that my client’s business comes first, and I work to create win-win scenarios for my clients and my company.

I graduated from Saint Joseph’s University in Philadelphia with a degree in Business Administration and have also enjoyed numerous professional enablement courses during my career.

My professional interests include continued learning on the intersection of business and technology, digital business enablement, advancements in ERP solutions, data science solutions, the Internet of Things and enterprise transformation. 

On a personal note, the majority of my free time is spent with family and friends. My greatest joy is supporting my children in the activities - soccer, cheerleading, taekwondo, public speaking programs, and others. I also enjoy helping with school, church and charity related functions.

If your organization is looking to grow through enterprise transformation, please feel free to contact me through my LinkedIn profile, by phone at (610) 742-4706, or by email at john.loughran@capgemini.com.

I am a marketing and technology executive passionate about driving strategy and operational excellence. I have led dynamic teams in Marketing and Information Technology, spanning non-profits to Fortune 10 across industries. As a result, I have a unique blend of strategic vision, analytical prowess and technical expertise.

I believe in “Do More” – a philosophy that drives me to exceed expectations, push boundaries and deliver more value. Whether it’s streamlining processes, leveraging data to inform strategy, driving financial rigor or fostering cross-functional collaboration, I am committed to achieving exceptional results.

To succeed at doing more, I believe in three pillars: people, data and technology. 

People: I foster a culture of continuous improvement, innovation and engagement within teams. Investing in people is key to long-term success.

Data: I am a data geek; data drives our ability to exceed our goals and evolve our business.

Technology: MarTech and AdTech underpin our vision execution. I have a proven approach to selecting the right technology, implementing it effectively and measuring ongoing success.

With a strong track record of delivering more value to stakeholders, I am excited to bring my extensive experience and strategic insight to new opportunities in the Marketing and Technology worlds.

Skills Highlights:

✅ Strategic Marketing: Proven ability to develop and execute strategies to drive brand growth and market share.

✅ Marketing Operational Excellence: Skilled in streamlining processes, implementing marketing automation and enhancing campaign execution.

✅ Data-Driven Decision Making: Advanced skills in leveraging data and analytics to inform strategies and optimize performance.

✅ Team Development: Proven expertise in managing high-performing global teams.

✅ Digital Marketing and MarTech: Extensive experience with digital channels, tools and infrastructure, including SEO/SEM, marketing automation, paid media, social media, content management, personalization, optimization and more.

✅ Omnichannel Customer Experiences: Deep understanding of customer journeys and how to accomplish them.

I am available for roles in the greater Minneapolis/St. Paul area or remote. Contact me here or at kimberlymyers@outlook.com.

column119:
The Eastern Company, founded in 1858, is a manufacturer of custom-engineered industrial hardware, security products and metal castings. We operates in the U.S., Canada, Mexico, Taiwan and China. The diversity of our capabilities and  products enables us to respond to the changing requirements of a broad array of markets.

Our Industrial Hardware Group manufactures an extensive selection of latches, locks and other security hardware used throughout the transportation and industrial sector of the economy. For more than 100 years, Eberhard has been an industry leader setting the standard for high-quality hardware for a variety of applications, especially in the transportation industry. In addition, this Group includes our Composite Panel Technologies division.

Our Security Products Group delivers solutions that safeguard property and control access.  The Illinois Lock Company/CCL Security Products Division produces custom-engineered locks for a variety of original equipment manufacturers and is a leading producer of keyless locks sold under well-known brand names such as Sesamee, Presto and Huski. 

Our Greenwald Industries Division is a major manufacturer of coin acceptors and metering systems to secure the cash used in self-service laundry facilities. Greenwald products are distributed throughout North and South America as well as in other areas of the world. Our expanded product line includes the latest in “Smart Card” and electronic payment systems.

Argo Transdata is a contract manufacturer of printed circuit board assemblies. Argo offers quick turnarounds and prototype builds as well as support and production quantities with Kanban releases.

The Company’s Metal Products Group manufactures a range of industrial products as well as anchoring devices for supporting underground mine roofs. This Division continues to be the recognized leader in the production of these critical safety devices for the United States, Canadian and Australian mining industries.

At Gainsight, our mission is to be living proof you can win in business while being human first. 

Gainsight, the world’s leading Customer Success platform, helps businesses drive efficient growth by unifying the post-sales customer journey. Our innovative suite of solutions—including customer success, customer education, product experience, community management, and conversational AI insights—are trusted by companies of all sizes and industries, including nearly 200 publicly traded organizations.

With Gainsight, businesses can leverage AI-driven insights from real-time customer interactions to enhance engagement, improve retention, and drive expansion. Our platform makes it easier for customer success, product, and community teams to scale efficiently and gain a holistic view of their customers, driving product adoption and building thriving customer communities.

Gainsight joined the Vista Equity Partners portfolio in 2020. In 2021, we won their Excellence in Engineering award in recognition for our product and engineering advancements.

A remote-friendly company, we have offices in the US, UK, Netherlands, Israel, and India. Gainsight received the top spot in Glassdoor's Best Places to Work for 2023. It has also been named as one of the top 100 private cloud companies in the world by Forbes, one of the fastest-growing private companies in America by Inc. Magazine, and one of 20 Great Workplaces in Tech by Fortune Magazine.
column151:
I thrive in fast-paced, high-growth environments where I can bring structure to chaos, connect people, and make things run more smoothly. Whether it’s aligning cross-functional teams, tackling complex business challenges, or helping leaders execute their vision, I love the work that happens behind the scenes to make big things possible.

As Chief of Staff to the Chief Revenue Officer at Gainsight, I focus on strategy, operations, and organizational effectiveness, helping to drive revenue growth, streamline decision-making, and keep the go-to-market engine running efficiently. My role sits at the intersection of strategy and execution, which means I spend my time solving problems, making connections, and ensuring teams are focused on what matters most.

I have a background in business operations, change management, and executive communications, and I’m passionate about bringing clarity, alignment, and momentum to organizations. I love learning (send me your book recommendations!), working with driven and thoughtful people, and figuring out how to make work better for everyone.

column118: Powering NYC, Westchester, and leading the clean energy transition.
column119:
We provide power to more than 10 million people and businesses across NYC and Westchester. Reliability and accessibility are central to what we do and how we provide energy service. Leading the industry to power tomorrow is our other focus- we are committed to aggressively transitioning away from fossil fuels to a net-zero economy by 2050. To help achieve this we collaborate with customers, regulators, policymakers, engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure our clean energy future is informed by principles of affordability, equity, and environmental justice. We’re also heavily investing in new technologies and the infrastructure that can get us there. 


What are a few things we have achieved so far?
•	Since 2009, our energy efficiency programs have prevented 11 million metric tons of carbon emissions – the same amount it would take to power 1.4 million homes for a year
•	Recently, we’ve embarked on an 8-year project to make our systems more resilient in the face of extreme weather events

Notice of Fraudulent Activity for Job Applicants: 
Please be aware of fraudulent communications from job posting sites or email. Bad actors may try to impersonate Crinetics’ Talent Acquisition team, and their messages may appear legitimate. column118: Human understanding. Human experiences.
column119: UserTesting is fundamentally changing the way digital products and experiences are built and delivered by helping organizations get insights from customers–from creation through execution. Built on top of a world-class, on-demand sourcing engine, customers can receive fast, high quality, opt-in feedback from both our proprietary and partner-sourced audience networks around the world. UserTesting offers the industry's most comprehensive experience research solution. Unlike approaches that track user behavior or collect customer listening data on live experiences, then try to infer what that data means, UserTesting enables companies to get input earlier in the process, helping to reduce guesswork, and bring experience data to life with human insight.

column100:
Loop Commerce powers gifting for retailers and redefines the way consumers purchase and send gifts, as well as the way recipients experience receiving them. Loop™ is an enterprise-grade SaaS platform and turnkey checkout solution that seamlessly integrates with a retailer's online store and essentially makes every product easily giftable. Buyers can purchase any product as a gift without the usual constraints, such as delivery time, or knowing the recipient’s style, color, size or shipping address. Recipients receive notifications of their gifts, and are directed to the retailer’s online store to accept them. Recipients can then configure gifts to suit their preferences, or 'virtually exchange' them online for something else before they ship to the address of their choosing. Retailers leverage this new way of gifting to increase sales, customer acquisition, reduce the costs of returns and exchanges, and gain actionable insights from customer data.

With $30 million investment from PayPal and other strategic investors who are influential individuals notable for their significant contributions to retail, technology and finance, Loop was recognized by Forbes magazine as one of “12 innovative companies moving global commerce forward.”
